name: Lazy Boss Paper Chuck VR
description:
Be the laziest boss you can be and kill time in a beautifully rendered VR office. It's time to kick back, let your staff do the work, and see how many points you can get when you toss the paper in to the waste basket.

FEATURES
- Lazy Boss Paper Chuck doesn't require controls or any input device. Just look and aim. The timer will count down 3 2 1 for you to interact with buttons or throw the paper ball.
- Super easy game play, just look at the waste basket and adjust your aim based on the wind from the fans.
- Enter your name and join the world high score leaderboards to beat your friends.
- Beautiful pre-rendered office environment with 360 views in VR.

NOTE
- This is a VR game and requires the use of a VR headset
- Lazy Boss Paper Chuck will soon be available on Oculus and HTC Vive devices.

Enjoy, have fun, and be lazy :)
